snippet: The settlement resolves civil rights lawsuits filed on behalf of roughly 1,600 people who were arrested during the 2004 Republican National Convention.
abstract: New York City is to pay nearly $18 million to settle civil rights lawsuits filed on behalf of roughly 1,600 people who claimed they were wrongfully swept up in mass arrests during 2004 Republican National Convention.
lead_paragraph: The settlement resolves civil rights lawsuits filed on behalf of roughly 1,600 people who were arrested during the 2004 Republican National Convention.

headline.main: New York City to Pay $18 Million Over Convention Arrests
headline.print_headline: City to Pay $18 Million Over Convention Arrests
